info.name: Zolara API
info.description: Complete API collection for Zolara Backend

request.description: Initiate registration process. Choose EMAIL or SMS verification.
Verify OTP code sent via email or SMS
Refresh access token using refresh token
Verify OTP for phone number update
Get user details by ID with privacy restrictions
Search user by email or phone number
Send friend request to another user
Accept or reject friend request (action: ACCEPT or REJECT)
Get list of received friend requests
Get list of sent friend requests
Get relationship status with another user
Create a new group with optional avatar
Get all groups the user is a member of
Send message to user with optional media files
Send message to group with optional media files
Mark all messages as read in a conversation
Forward message to users or groups
Generate new QR code for login
Scan QR code with mobile device
Get comprehensive dashboard statistics including user stats, message stats, call stats, and chart data for analytics
Create a new post with optional content, media files, and privacy level (public, friends, private)

query.description: asc or desc (default: desc - newest first)

request.description: Get feed of posts from the currently logged-in user and all their friends (ACCEPTED status). Sorted by newest first (desc) by default. Respects privacy settings.

query.description: asc or desc (default: desc - newest first)

request.description: Get list of posts from the currently logged-in user. Sorted by newest first (desc) by default.

query.description: asc or desc (default: desc - newest first)

request.description: Get list of posts with pagination. Supports filtering by userId and sorting. Default: sorted by newest first (desc).
Get post details by ID with privacy restrictions
Update post content, media, or privacy level. Only the post owner can update.
Delete a post. Only the post owner can delete.
Toggle like reaction on a post. If already liked, it will unlike. Returns { liked: boolean, message: string }
Get comments for a post with pagination. Returns list of comments sorted by newest first.
Create a comment on a post. Optional repliedTo field for reply comments.
Send a message to the AI agent and receive a complete response. No authentication required. Supports conversation history and session tracking.
Get current AI agent configuration settings including model, temperature, max tokens, and system prompt.
Check if the AI agent service is available and properly configured. Returns availability status and configuration state.
